venue.address_1: 10 Juliana van Stolberglaan  2595 CL Den Haag  Netherlands
venue.name: The Hague Tech

results.description:
We are excited to announce that we will be holding our next Analytics at Speed meetup in The Hague, in collaboration with THT Growth Sessions and AI Lab!

Join us for an evening full of ideas, insights, and opportunities with two inspiring speakers from innovative and cutting-edge companies.

Agenda:
18:30 Doors open - Meet and greet with a drink!
18:50 Introduction
19:00 First Talk + Q&A
19:40 Break for a Pizza
20:00 Second Talk +Q&A
20:40 Networking drinks
21:30 End

About the speakers:

About Kx:

By enabling countless connections between devices across the organization, the IoT provides us with opportunities to be more efficient in how we do things, saving us time, improving yields and adding value. However, the focus is moving from what the IoT could do, to what it can do. How it contributes to business goals and how it delivers value. Organizations are moving towards how the IoT, combined with ML, AI, and advanced analytics can help them extract insights, make better more timely decisions and improve revenues from sensor data.

Sean Lang, Business Development Lead at Kx, will speak about his thoughts on the IoT & AI while citing the various use cases Kx have worked on with NASA, Airbus, and other Fortune 500 manufacturing corporations since their leading time-series database technology was founded in Palo Alto back in 1996.

The second speaker is kdb+ engineer, Esperanza Lopez Aguilera who will be presenting on Machine Learning!

RSVP here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/scaling-your-business-with-exponential-technology-ai-iot-tickets-52168600689
results.name: Scaling your business with exponential technology (AI & IoT)
